resources.string: Discover, track, and bookmark your favorite movies and TV shows.

Struggling to find your next movie night pick? Welcome to Mimasu (みます), your sleek and simple guide to the world of film and television!\n\nPowered by The Movie Database (TMDB), Mimasu helps you stay up-to-date with the latest entertainment. Browse through trending movies, discover popular TV series, and explore detailed information to find exactly what you're looking for.
For further information or legal inquiries, please contact the owner.
This website does not collect or store any personal data and does not use cookies.\n\nApp related data protection can be found on Google Play.
This website does not use cookies.
